discussion.content:

C. Implement an active-passive disaster recovery solution.

An active-passive disaster recovery solution allows you to have a secondary site (West US) that remains on standby until a failover is needed. This setup is cost-effective compared to an active-active solution and allows for controlled failover and failback tests.
